siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Have you already seen The Chosen? If so, your most common question has been, "When is Season Two coming out?" Or in many cases, it hasn't been a question, it's been more like, "GIVE ME SEASON TWO NOW!" Well, the wait is over. Launching with a huge global livestream Easter Sunday at 8pm ET (important details below), Season Two is here.

Haven't seen The Chosen? Don't watch this trailer! We encourage you to catch up on Season One fast, because we can't promise the millions who will watch Season Two won't reveal spoilers. So stop what you're doing and go "binge Jesus," as we like to say.

"How do I watch The Chosen?" Good question. It's free and easy. Yes, free...doesn't even require an email address. Look up "The Chosen" wherever you get your phone apps, download it, and then you can freely and easily connect it directly from there to your streaming device (Apple TV, Firestick, Roku, Chromecast). Don't have a streaming device? Probably time to get one.

"Wait, free and easy? How is that possible?" Again, good question. We happen to be the #1 highest crowd-funded media project of all time, which means we've done this completely outside the system. We built our own app, we've sold our own DVDs, and instead of requiring payment to watch, we offer you the chance to "pay it forward" so we can continue to keep it free and also produce future seasons. But you don't have to. Seriously.

We're watched in literally every country in the world, we've been translated into over 50 languages, and we've heard from literally millions of people that getting to know the authentic Jesus has changed their life.

Season Two launches Easter Sunday, 8:00pm ET, with a huge global livestream on our FB & Youtube channels and "The Chosen" app, and from then on, it'll be available forever.

Welcome to The Chosen. Get used to different.

Watch The Chosen on our free app: https://thechosen.tv/app
Wear The Chosen and go deeper with our study materials: https://thechosengifts.com

#BingeJesus by subscribing to our YouTube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/c/thechosenseries?sub_confirmation=1

Watch More!

The immense weight of playing Jesus
https://youtu.be/CZdB7H8ty8g

#GetUsedToDifferent by following us:
https://www.facebook.com/InsidetheChosen/
https://www.instagram.com/thechosentvseries/
https://twitter.com/thechosentv
https://www.tiktok.com/@thechosentv
blogPost.body:
Have you already seen The Chosen? If so, your most common question has been, "When is Season Two coming out?" Or in many cases, it hasn't been a question, it's been more like, "GIVE ME SEASON TWO NOW!" Well, the wait is over. Launching with a huge global livestream Easter Sunday at 8pm ET (important details below), Season Two is here.

Haven't seen The Chosen? Don't watch this trailer! We encourage you to catch up on Season One fast, because we can't promise the millions who will watch Season Two won't reveal spoilers. So stop what you're doing and go "binge Jesus," as we like to say.

"How do I watch The Chosen?" Good question. It's free and easy. Yes, free...doesn't even require an email address. Look up "The Chosen" wherever you get your phone apps, download it, and then you can freely and easily connect it directly from there to your streaming device (Apple TV, Firestick, Roku, Chromecast). Don't have a streaming device? Probably time to get one.

"Wait, free and easy? How is that possible?" Again, good question. We happen to be the #1 highest crowd-funded media project of all time, which means we've done this completely outside the system. We built our own app, we've sold our own DVDs, and instead of requiring payment to watch, we offer you the chance to "pay it forward" so we can continue to keep it free and also produce future seasons. But you don't have to. Seriously.

We're watched in literally every country in the world, we've been translated into over 50 languages, and we've heard from literally millions of people that getting to know the authentic Jesus has changed their life.

localize.title: 天选者：第二季官方预告片 第二季官方预告片
localize.description:
你已经看过《天选之人》了吗？如果是的话，你最常见的问题是，"第二季什么时候出？" 或者在很多情况下，它并不是一个问题，它更像是，"现在就给我第二季！" 好了，等待已经结束了。在美国东部时间复活节周日晚上8点（重要细节如下），第二季将在这里推出一个巨大的全球直播。

还没看过《天选者》？不要看这个预告片! 我们鼓励你赶快追上第一季，因为我们不能保证数百万观看第二季的人不会透露剧透。所以停止你正在做的事情，去 "狂欢耶稣"，正如我们喜欢说的那样。

"我怎么看《天选者》？" 问得好 它是免费的，很容易。是的，免费......甚至不需要电子邮件地址。查找 "天选之人"，无论你在哪里得到你的手机应用程序，下载它，然后你可以自由和容易地连接它直接从那里到你的流媒体设备（苹果电视，火棍，Roku，Chromecast）。没有流媒体设备？可能是时候买一个了。

"等等，免费又简单？这怎么可能？" 同样，好问题。我们恰好是有史以来众筹金额最高的媒体项目，这意味着我们完全是在系统之外完成的。我们建立了自己的应用程序，我们卖出了自己的DVD，而且我们不需要付费观看，而是为你提供了 "向前支付 "的机会，这样我们就可以继续保持免费，也可以制作未来的季节。但你不必这样做。认真的。

我们的节目在世界每个国家都有收看，我们的节目被翻译成50多种语言，我们听到数以百万计的人说，认识真实的耶稣改变了他们的生活。

第二季将于美国东部时间复活节周日晚上8:00开始，在我们的FB和Youtube频道以及 "天选之人 "应用程序上进行全球直播，从那时起，它将永远存在。

欢迎来到 "天选者"。习惯于与众不同。

在我们的免费应用程序上观看 "天选者"：https://thechosen.tv/app。
穿上《天选之人》，与我们的学习资料一起走向深入：https://thechosengifts.com。

通过订阅我们的YouTube频道，#BingeJesus。
https://www.youtube.com/c/thechosenseries?sub_confirmation=1

看更多

扮演耶稣的巨大重量
https://youtu.be/CZdB7H8ty8g

关注我们，#GetUsedToDifferent#。
https://www.facebook.com/InsidetheChosen/
https://www.instagram.com/thechosentvseries/
https://twitter.com/thechosentv
https://www.tiktok.com/@thechosentv

localize.title: 天選者：第二季官方預告片 第二季官方預告片
localize.description:
你已經看過《天選之人》了嗎？如果是的話，你最常見的問題是，"第二季什麼時候出？" 或者在很多情況下，它並不是一個問題，它更像是，"現在就給我第二季！" 好了，等待已經結束了。在美國東部時間復活節週日晚上8點（重要細節如下），第二季將在這裏推出一個巨大的全球直播。

還沒看過《天選者》？不要看這個預告片! 我們鼓勵你趕快追上第一季，因爲我們不能保證數百萬觀看第二季的人不會透露劇透。所以停止你正在做的事情，去 "狂歡耶穌"，正如我們喜歡說的那樣。

"我怎麼看《天選者》？" 問得好 它是免費的，很容易。是的，免費......甚至不需要電子郵件地址。查找 "天選之人"，無論你在哪裏得到你的手機應用程序，下載它，然後你可以自由和容易地連接它直接從那裏到你的流媒體設備（蘋果電視，火棍，Roku，Chromecast）。沒有流媒體設備？可能是時候買一個了。

"等等，免費又簡單？這怎麼可能？" 同樣，好問題。我們恰好是有史以來衆籌金額最高的媒體項目，這意味着我們完全是在系統之外完成的。我們建立了自己的應用程序，我們賣出了自己的DVD，而且我們不需要付費觀看，而是爲你提供了 "向前支付 "的機會，這樣我們就可以繼續保持免費，也可以製作未來的季節。但你不必這樣做。認真的。

我們的節目在世界每個國家都有收看，我們的節目被翻譯成50多種語言，我們聽到數以百萬計的人說，認識真實的耶穌改變了他們的生活。

第二季將於美國東部時間復活節週日晚上8:00開始，在我們的FB和Youtube頻道以及 "天選之人 "應用程序上進行全球直播，從那時起，它將永遠存在。

歡迎來到 "天選者"。習慣於與衆不同。

在我們的免費應用程序上觀看 "天選者"：https://thechosen.tv/app。
穿上《天選之人》，與我們的學習資料一起走向深入：https://thechosengifts.com。

通過訂閱我們的YouTube頻道，#BingeJesus。
https://www.youtube.com/c/thechosenseries?sub_confirmation=1

看更多

扮演耶穌的巨大重量
https://youtu.be/CZdB7H8ty8g

關注我們，#GetUsedToDifferent#。
https://www.facebook.com/InsidetheChosen/
https://www.instagram.com/thechosentvseries/
https://twitter.com/thechosentv
https://www.tiktok.com/@thechosentv
